H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H2296.def: = state in which someone wears clothes or armor

H8081.def: = high quality {L:oil<SDBH:שֶׁמֶן>}, ◄ extracted from the fruits of the olive tree during the first pressing; ► used as food, medicine, fuel, perfume (when mixed with spices), and other purposes; also used in various religious rituals; ≈ associated with joy, but also known for its softness, smoothness, and elusiveness

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

111.dom: Names of People|Names of Groups|Names of Locations

H3058.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Jehoshaphat<SDBH:יְהֹושָׁפָט>}, son of {L:Nimshi<SDBH:נִמְשִׁי>}; ► king of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} (c. 841-814)

H3157.def: = town; ◄ located in the {L:hill country<SDBH:הַר>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H348.def: = woman; ◄ daughter of {L:Ethbaal<SDBH:אֶתְבַּעַל>}, king of {L:Sidon<SDBH:צִידֹון>}; ► wife of king {L:Ahab<SDBH:אַחְאָב>}

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H6320.def: = a black powder, ► used as eye make-up

H3190.def: = causative action by which humans cause objects to be in a better state of maintenance than before

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H1157.def: = path through which a certain entity can be accessed, which can vary from a relatively narrow opening on one side to the entire surrounding space

H2474.def: = an opening ◄ in the wall of a building, ► which admits light and often air to a room and allows its occupants to look out, or objects within to be seen; in some cases they can be opened and closed; sometimes used as secret entrance or exit; ≈ has therefore some connonations of secrecy

H3058.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Jehoshaphat<SDBH:יְהֹושָׁפָט>}, son of {L:Nimshi<SDBH:נִמְשִׁי>}; ► king of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} (c. 841-814)

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H2174.def: = man; official of {L:Elah<SDBH:אֵלָה>} who conspired against him and was king of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} for seven days (ca. 876 BCE)

H2026.def: = causative action by which someone takes the life of a person, animal, or plant in a violent way

H113.def: = man who is in a position of authority over another person or object as a legal owner, employer, husband, or sovereign; or a person or deity who is referred to as such in a conversation or prayer

H5375.def: = process by which an object increases in height

H2474.def: = an opening ◄ in the wall of a building, ► which admits light and often air to a room and allows its occupants to look out, or objects within to be seen; in some cases they can be opened and closed; sometimes used as secret entrance or exit; ≈ has therefore some connonations of secrecy

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H4310.def: = a reference to an unknown person or deity; normally used with the purpose of identifying that person or deity; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that person or deity cannot be identified

H854.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H8147.def: = state in which a countable entity is two in number

H7969.def: = state in which a countable entity is three in number

H5631.def: = a male who has been castrated and made to serve in the women's quarters in the royal palace

H8058.def: = process by which an animal fails to grip or make proper contact with a surface

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H1818.def: = red liquid that circulates in the arteries and veins of humans and animals; ► used in rituals such as sacrifices, purification and covenant ceremonies, and never to be eaten; ≈ regarded as the seat of {L:life<SDBH:נֶפֶשׁ>}; human blood, when flowing from the body, pollutes the body and the land

H5137.def: = process by which drops or small quantities of a liquid fall on object

H7023.def: = flat construction, ◄ normally made of stone, ► used as a divider of spaces, or to enclose a space

H5483.def: = large domesticated solid-hoofed quadruped; stockily built in comparison to today's horses, with shorter heads and thicker necks; about 122–142 cm tall, and 2.1 m long; its coat varies from dark to pale brown; it eats plants; ◄ Equus caballus; ► used in battle, both to ride and for pulling chariots; ≈ symbolic of military might; associated with the sun, which was said to ride across the sky in a chariot

H7429.def: = action by which humans, deities, or animals tread heavily and noisily on people, plants, or objects; ► usually with the purpose of killing, destroying, desecrating, and/or humiliating

H398.def: = action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

H6485.def: = action by which humans or deities carefully observe a person, group, or object ► with the purpose of determining their well-being, condition, and/or integrity

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H779.def: = to consign someone or something to death, damage, or destruction, usually by invoking the name of a deity if the agent is human; ◄ this is done as punishment, out of contempt, anger, or hostility, or because one was hired to do so

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H6912.def: = to put the body of someone who died in a designated place, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or in a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ associated with death, but also with honor and respect

H1323.def: = direct or indirect female offspring of humans or animals, either biologically or through adoption

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H6912.def: = to put the body of someone who died in a designated place, such as a hole in a rock or in the ground, or in a place which was constructed specifically for this purpose; ≈ associated with death, but also with honor and respect

H4672.def: = process by which humans or animals discover the person, animal, object or location they were looking for

H518.def: = marker indicating that the event in focus has to be true before another event can take place

H1538.def: = a bone framework enclosing the brain of a vertebrate; sometimes used metonymically to represent an entire human being

H7272.def: = the lower part of the lower limb of the body of humans, animals, and --by extension-- of deities, which in some contexts may include the full leg; ► used for standing and walking; ≈ associated with authority, and also used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H3709.def: = the inner part of the human {L:hand<SDBH:יָד>}, but with special focus on the activities performed with it, such as holding, covering, or lifting objects, leaning on a staff, clapping, etc.

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H5046.def: = causative action by which humans pass on information to others, usually by word of mouth

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H1696.def: = causative action by which someone exterminates a group of people, either directly or by the hands of someone else

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H5650.def: = man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God

H2506.def: = one part of an object (or range of objects) that has been divided into several portions

H3157.def: = town; ◄ located in the {L:hill country<SDBH:הַר>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H3611.def: = relatively small light brown domestic animal, feeding on anything from household refuse to animal carcasses and excreta; ◄ |iCanis familiaris putiatini|i*; ► extremely unclean animal and therefore not to be eaten, though used for hunting and for watching sheep; ≈ considered almost as unclean as a {L:pig<SDBH:חֲזִיר>}; associated with all sorts of uncleanness, aggression, greediness, low status; used as derogatory term for male shrine prostitutes

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H398.def: = action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object

H1320.def: = the soft substance in the body of humans and animals that consists of muscle tissue and fat

H348.def: = woman; ◄ daughter of {L:Ethbaal<SDBH:אֶתְבַּעַל>}, king of {L:Sidon<SDBH:צִידֹון>}; ► wife of king {L:Ahab<SDBH:אַחְאָב>}
= woman; ◄ daughter of {L:Ethbaal<SDBH:אֶתְבַּעַל>}, king of {L:Sidon<SDBH:צִידֹון>}; ► wife of king {L:Ahab<SDBH:אַחְאָב>}

H5038.def: = the dead body of humans or animals

H1828.def: = excrement; ◄  produced by animals; ► source of pollution and impurity; ≈ regarded as filthy and only good as fertilizer

H7704.def: = a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.

H2506.def: = one part of an object (or range of objects) that has been divided into several portions
